articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Google tests an email-based productivity assistant - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google's new email-based assistant will be available to AI Pro and Ultra plan users over the age of 18 in North America.
articles.content: Productivity is one space where companies keep wanting to experiment with AI assistants in the hope that they will save time for users, and as a result, they will want to use those assistants more. G… [+1295 chars]

articles.title: Private Sector Job Growth Fuels President Trump’s Economy - The White House (.gov)
articles.description: “The strong jobs report shows how President Trump is fixing the damage caused by Joe Biden and creating a strong, America First economy in record time.
articles.content: Todays jobs report shows the strength of President Donald J. Trumps economy is in the private sector where it should be.
